intro: Guettarda dictyophylla, commonly known as the flame tree or the evergreen flame tree, is a tropical plant native to Central and South America. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its striking, fiery orange-red flowers that bloom throughout the year. The plant has glossy, dark green leaves that are opposite and elliptical in shape. It thrives in warm, humid climates and is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its vibrant floral display. Guettarda dictyophylla is also valued for its ability to grow in a variety of soil types and its relatively low maintenance requirements.
